title: Eddie Jones contemplating resting key men for final pool match against France
text:
England could field a second string side for the final pool match against France, after becoming the first side to qualify for the knock-out stages of the World Cup here in Japan following their 39-10 victory over Argentina on Saturday.

England’s football side controversially made eight changes for their final group match at the World Cup in Russia last year and lost to Belgium, which enabled Gareth Southgate’s side to avoid the half of the draw including Brazil, France and Argentina and instead reach the semi-finals by defeating Colombia and Sweden.

Jones is facing a similar dilemma. If England finish Pool C in second place, they are likely to face Wales in the quarter-finals, and should they...
description: England could field a second string side for the final pool match against France, after becoming the first side to qualify for the knock-out stages of the World Cup here in Japan following their 39-10 victory over Argentina on Saturday.
